example.text: I joined [[user]] on [[user]] last night to discuss new federal criminal charges filed against [[user]]. [[user]] now has a choice. They can either continue to condone his deception and corruption or they can do what they should’ve done long ago — vote to expel him. [[url]]

Grateful to my colleagues who supported our bipartisan legislation and passed it out of committee. The Abraham Accords gave birth to a new Middle East, and we must safeguard that progress with a Special Envoy to expand the circle of peace and prosperity for the entire region. [[url]]

As New York presses forward with a first-in-the-nation Central Business District Tolling Program, I'm proud to have successfully secured $155 million in new investments to significantly mitigate air pollution and greenhouse gases for the Bronx and beyond. [[url]]

[[user]] is an embarrassment to the institution of Congress and our nation. It's not enough for Republicans to say he should resign because actions speak louder than words. [[user]] must join us in voting to expel him -- otherwise they're just enabling him. [[url]]

I'm constantly inspired by young people from the city I love who advocate for the issues they care about -- from safe and accessible public transportation to workforce development opportunities. Thank you [[user]] for taking time to visit with me in our DC office today! [[url]]

Grateful to my colleagues who supported our bipartisan legislation and passed it out of committee. The Abraham Accords gave birth to a new Middle East, and we must safeguard that progress with a Special Envoy to expand the circle of peace and prosperity for the entire region. [[url]]

I just voted NO on HR 2 -- the Child Deportation Act. Our immigration system needs reform, but this cruel bill from extreme MAGA Republicans destroys our asylum system, vilifies migrants, and jails children indefinitely. It's not how we treat those seeking refuge at our door. [[url]]
